duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and execute core employee relations functions, programs, and services.
Evaluate, direct, and oversee Employee Relations Advisors.
Advise management on performance issues, corrective action, conflict resolution, discrimination complaints, and misconduct investigations.
Develop and implement policies, procedures, and best practice processes for conducting investigations and corrective actions.
Proactively identify and report on trends impacting organizational risk, employee engagement, and turnover.
Develop training content on employment practices and deliver content as a subject matter expert.
Handle individual employee relations matters involving senior management or as requested by the Vice President of Human Resources or the Chief Human Resources Officer.
Proactively participate in the HR leadership team and collaborate with key stakeholders.
Model a transformational approach to HR service delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field
